name: I'm so fucking Alive
description:
A game i'v made...like 2 or 3 Years ago.
It's a simple and basic brutality game. Enter a sandy fortress and destroy all enemies in your way.

I created it with the idea of "taking pleasure in creating something" So ...
The game was pretty quickly made so don't be surprised if there is some bugs, weird mistakes, or strange lags.

And it's...quite chaotic... beware of the headache !

But it's really fun !
Hope you will enjoy it ! :)
